Bad movie, good quote

15 Sep 2011
Last night I watched World's Greatest DadÂ on Netflix Streaming.

The trailer was good, the movie was pretty bad.

BUT it ended with a very interesting quote:

"I used to think the worst thing in life was to end up all alone. It's not. The worst thing in life is ending up with people who make you feel all alone."

So perhaps it was worth the 99 minutes of my life.
